title.narrative: EDUCATION SYSTEM WITH CAPACITIES

description.narrative: By 2016, the system of education in six departments has acquired the capacities required for decentralized and participatory management as well as the necessary pedagogical capacity., which contributes to Education In Emergencies, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2016, children and adolescents in six priority departments are able to start school at the right time and successfully complete basic education

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2016, the system of education in six departments has acquired the capacities required for decentralized and participatorymanagement as well as the necessary pedagogical capacity.

description.narrative: In six departments, the education system's capacity to universalise pre-primary education has been strengthened. The quality of primary education improved in 30 selected municipalities. The foundations have been laid for a bilingual intercultural education model for two indigenous peoples. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:30/12/2016

title.narrative: Percentage of the elementary schools in priority western municipalities where a quality pedagogical model is implemented on three first grades
Percentage of the elementary schools in priority western municipalities where guidelines on violence prevention with a rights approach has been incorporated in their regulations
Percentage of the elementary schools in Gracias a Dios where a quality pedagogical model is implemented on first grade

actual.value: 2016:Construction of a quality pedagogical model was started, involving technical teams, teachers and community organization in the Misquitos and Tolupan towns of 4 municipalities

title.narrative: Quality pedagogical model in primary education introduces in its design a component in order to reduce gender stereotypes

actual.value: 2016:The following stereotypes have been defined to work on: girls are not good at math, girls can not lead school governments, girls must obey boys, boys should not be involved in cleaning activities, school sports must be segregated by sex.
